page.title: 09Ingatestone - Housing.
page.content: Outside Ingatestone and Fryerning housing consists mainly of farmhouses and smaller dwellings originally constructed for farmworkers. Ingatesone's main function is residential and, in general, housing is of a high standard. There are many large detached houses in the area which may cost anything from Â£80,000 upwards. There are also many estates consisting of semi-detached houses (typically having three or four bedrooms) which can be bought from about Â£45,000. Along the High Street there are a number of small purpose built blocks of flats (usually two bedrooms and costing Â£30,000 or more). In addition to this privately owned housing there are some council houses available to rent though the stock is declining as tenants exercise their 'right to buy' at a discount.
